page.title: 08EDUCATION CREATIVE WRITING
page.content: {SINBAD}(Part 2) The 'bushes' helped Sinbad make a raft out of palm trees, tied together with vines. Finally the raft was completed. Four natives carried the raft out of the dark, dank hut down the precipi- tous rock face. Sinbad set sail for wherever his raft would take him. When he was out of sight of the natives, he lay down and slept, the gentle rock of the boat making him doze off. { {MY PET DRAGON}(Part 1) by Marcus Iddon One day I was walking to school when I heard a scuttling noise in the bushes. I looked in the bushes and saw a little green dragon with ruby-like eyes. Its skin was like velvet. Its nose was like one great emerald. That evening I sat in my bed dreaming about the dragon I had seen that day.
